name: Don't Explode!
description:
Based on those old cartoons scenes where the characters falls in a dark place, and when they light a fire, they are surrounded by bombs.

You have a light, which you control the intensity, and when you get close to a bomb, it will start igniting based on the light's intensity.

Your objective is to pass through all those bombs, and not explode yourself.

Commands

WASD - Move

R - Increase Light Intensity

F - Decrease Light Intensity

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-89

The game was made on Unreal Engine 4 all by myself, programming, models and textures in under two days.
